name: After Fright (v0.0.2)
description:
In this "Fan Game" of the FNAF (Five Nights At Freddy's) saga, the events that happened after the fire of FNAF 3 and before the public auction are recounted.

Synopsis:

After the fire, the owners of the Fazbear Fright horror attraction decided to put up for auction the few things that weren't lost during the incident.

While the auction was being organized, they contacted a warehouse to store the things they recovered before the day of the auction.

You are David, the warehouse's night security guard, and so your job is to keep the site safe throughout the night. Or try to keep you safe?

NOTE: This game is not canonical in the official history of the FNAF saga.

Warning:

This game is still under development.

News about the game will be posted on our Gamejolt page.

If you want to see more details about the development of the game, you can join our Discord.
